cinnamon.engine.gfx

Class Canvas<E extends Viewport>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.gfx.Canvas<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Size
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DemoCanvas

    public abstract class Canvas<E extends Viewport>
extends Object
implements Size

    Represents an OpenGL backed drawing surface.

    No OpenGL calls should be made in the this class' constructor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Canvas()
      Constructs a drawing surface setup for OpenGL operations.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(int r,
                               int g,
                               int b,
                               int a)

        Sets the background color using color values 0-255 inclusive.

        Parameters:
        r - red.
        g - green.
        b - blue.
        a - alpha.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the color values are < 0 or > 255.

      • setBackgroundColorPercent

        public void setBackgroundColorPercent(float r,
                                      float g,
                                      float b,
                                      float a)

        Sets the background color using normalized values 0.0f - 1.0f inclusive.

        Parameters:
        r - red.
        g - green.
        b - blue.
        a - alpha.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the color values are < 0.0f or > 1.0f.
